module.description: extract R code from gist linked in blog post https://procomun.wordpress.com/2015/04/14/mapping-flows-in-r-with-data-table-and-lattice/

source.script:
## extract gist url from blog page <- readLines("https://procomun.wordpress.com/2015/04/14/mapping-flows-in-r-with-data-table-and-lattice/") line <- page[grep("<script[[:print:]]*gist.github.com", page)] gist_url <- strsplit(line, "src=\"")[[1]][2] gist_url <- strsplit(gist_url, ".js\"")[[1]][1]
## clone gist library(git2r) local_path <- file.path(getwd(), "gist") dir.create(local_path, recursive=TRUE) repo <- git2r::clone(url = gist_url, local_path = local_path)
